Title: Thin Air (1)
Plot: Twelve years after Joanna Gold famously disappeared in broad daylight on Hampstead Heath, the dress she was wearing is found in a lock-up. The team begin the hunt for her killer.
GuestStars: Gabriella   Saunders,  Danielle Lyn Saunders,  Roger Allam,  Cherie Lunghi,  Sophie Winkleman,  George Calil,  Jack Ellis,  Ralph Nossek,  Justin Salinger,  Paul Bazely,  Louise Delamere,  Justin Shevlin,  Steve
